description.gold-silver:
An attack that may
freeze the foe.
description.crystal:
An attack that may
freeze the foe.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Hits the foe with an icy
storm that may freeze it.
description.emerald:
Hits the foe with an icy
storm that may freeze it.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is blasted
with a blizzard.
It may freeze the
foe solid.
description.diamond-pearl:
A howling blizzard is
summoned to strike
the foe.
It may also freeze
the target solid.
description.platinum:
A howling blizzard is
summoned to strike
the foe.
It may also freeze
the target solid.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
A howling blizzard is
summoned to strike
the foe.
It may also freeze
the target solid.
description.black-white:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike
the opposing team. It may also freeze
them solid.
description.black-2-white-2:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike
the opposing team. It may also freeze
them solid.
description.x-y:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike
opposing Pokémon. This may also leave
the opposing Pokémon frozen.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike
opposing Pokémon. This may also leave
the opposing Pokémon frozen.
description.sun-moon:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing
Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing
Pokémon frozen.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing
Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing
Pokémon frozen.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing
Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing
Pokémon frozen.
description.sword-shield:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing
Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing
Pokémon frozen.

effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target.

During hail, this move has 100% accuracy.  It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target.
